name: WIWU
description:
This is a fun (very short) platformer thrown together in Unity. Im very unexperienced in gamedevelopment  so there is bound to be some bugs, but in recent tests there were no major game-breaking glitch.Main aspect of the game is speedrun.

Ingame rules: If you collect all the orbs and finnish the map your time will freeze in green colour. If you  finnish the map  without all of the orbs collected, your time will freeze in red colour. You can reset the map and the  timer with the 'Esc' key.  

Used Assets & Music:  

  • Asset - 2D Handcrafted Art by: Alien Nude LTD(Link)
  • Asset -  Sunny Land by: Ansiumz(Link)
  • Music - Tropical Moments  by: Alien Nude LTD(Link)
  • Music - To the Black by: Dirty Palm(Link)
